title: Field ni Soyogu Kaze
original_name: フィールドにそよぐ風
sinopse: Trying to prove he is the better soccer player, Kenji tackles and injures Yuta's leg during a trial for the school team. Impressed by the fact that Yuta still does what he can to contribute to the team; Kenji begins to realize the true meaning of sportsmanship.
